name: Golden Snake - Demo (5 levels only)
description:
An action-platformer game about treasure hunter, his nick is Golden Snake, he got it while found his first artifact it was key to treasures made as a golden snake.

In the game, you will explore different locations of islands lost in time and map. On your way will different creatures and monsters. Use a machete to save your bullets and go forward through dangerous tombs and jungle.

Game in development. UI is for testing only, some UI functionality is absent. 5 levels only In demo. 

Controls: 

  • Mobile - touch UI controls

PC/Mac browser:  

  • Run - arrows
  • Jump - up arrow
  • Moving on ladders - up/down arrows
  • Machette hit - space
  • A/S - swap weapons
  • Z - Shoot
  • Ctrl - to grip the box / to release the box - move it with arrows keys
  • Down - get into the gates or doors

Support our dev team on Patreon, please or by donating, we have many ideas for new games. Also, we plan to make a second part for this game with new gameplay and content.
